body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#26)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#25)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#24)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#23)
- Make haskell code visible to ghci. @iphydf (#22)
- Update to new third_party method for haskell deps. @iphydf (#21)
- Add warning suppression. @iphydf (#20)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#13)
- Use TokTok/toktok-stack now that upgrade-bazel is merged. @iphydf (#12)
- Use rules_cc instead of native C rules. @iphydf (#11)
- Use bazel to build c-toxcore-hs. @iphydf (#10)
- Fix travis build: saltine now needs pkg-config to find libsodium. @iphydf (#9)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#8)
- Add README.md; we now have a test that checks for it. @iphydf (#7)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#6)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#5)
- Update CryptoCore API to toxcore internal API changes. @iphydf (#4)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#3)
- Only build master branch on Travis. @iphydf (#2)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#18)
- Update to latest toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#17)
- Use toktok-stack 0.0.23 for cirrus builds. @iphydf (#16)
- Upgrade to ghc-8.10.3 @iphydf (#15)
- Add cirrus-ci config and remove Travis. @iphydf (#14)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Use new `MonadValidate` stuff from msgpack-types. @iphydf (#19)
name: v0.1.0
